projects.title: GITHUB REPOSITORIES
projects.description: All of my projects are stored in the Github, from there you can check how I build things from scratch.

projects.title: PERSONAL PHP TOOLS
projects.description: My personal tools that I always used, all are written in PHP. I created this tools to automate some of my common tasks.

projects.title: SKOOP
projects.description: A freelance project. I handle mostly all of the backend and devops part of the website and I also interact with the DHL web services.

projects.title: PHP SIMPLE CAPTCHA
projects.description: The reason why I created this package is because I want to implement a simple anti-spam feature in my project that are written in PHP.

projects.title: KNOWLEDGE
projects.description: Some of my documentations, tutorials and guides are all stored in this repositories. Remember: Everything that you need.

projects.title: WORDPRESS SCAFFOLDING
projects.description: I created my own starter pack for wordpress, this includes composer (a package manager in PHP), some security default configuration and better version management of wordpress.

projects.title: WORDPRESS DB SCHEMA EXTENDER
projects.description: A wordpress plugin that will beautify your table schema and SQL query statement creation.

projects.title: CSS DUMP DESIGNS
projects.description: A collection of common CSS designs that I always used to my projects.

projects.title: DOMAIN DRIVEN AND THE CLEAN ARCHITECTURE DESIGN
projects.description: I've made a diagram combining the principle of domain driven and the clean architecture design. I used this diagram to build some my latest personal projects.
